txt.en: Quickbeam has asked you to quiet the forest south-east of Wellinghall.
Quickbeam is at Derndingle in south-east Fangorn.
Tend the forest south-east of Wellinghall
Slugs are infesting the river south-east of Wellinghall

'When we marched on Isengard, the forest was awoken. It is very angry with the actions of the wizard we trusted. Too angry, I cannot calm it myself.\n\n'Please tend the forest south-east of Wellinghall.'
Driftwood is blocking the river south-east of Wellinghall
When the Ents decided to march to war, the forest awoke, angry and betrayed. With Isengard destroyed, Quickbeam is attempting to calm Fangorn and quiet it once more.
